abstract: Estate of Martin Luther King Jr Inc drops lawsuit it had brought against the Martin Luther King Jr Center for Nonviolent Social Change, resolving one of two legal battles that have divided King's children.
lead_paragraph: The suit had asked a judge to stop the King Center from using the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.’s image, likeness and memorabilia.
snippet: The suit had asked a judge to stop the King Center from using the Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.’s image, likeness and memorabilia.

headline.main: Georgia: Dr. King’s Children End One Suit Over Legacy
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Family Ends One Suit Over Martin Luther King’s Legacy
